attributes.action: Ban anymore immigrants from inside the eu
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EU immigrants are taking all our childrens jobs and homes. As UK citizens we gain nothing from being in the EU we can only lose out. I have two children of working age who are out of work because of the large Polish workforce and i have  been told by council employees that they will be waiting for years for accomodation due to eastern european immigrants. I work for the NHS and so much money is being spent on new arrivals to the UK.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban anymore immigrants from inside the eu."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11173.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/immigrants/
